verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah year הַשִּׁשִּׁ֗ית <WH8345> hash-shish-Shit, And it came to pass in the sixth בַּשִּׁשִּׁי֙ <WH8345> bash-shish-Shi in the sixth בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> ba-cha-mish-Shah [month] in the fifth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev [as] I sat בְּבֵיתִ֔י <WH1004> be-vei-Ti, in mine house וְזִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> ve-zik-Nei and the elders יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah יוֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> yo-she-Vim sat לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> le-fa-Nai; before וַתִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> vat-tip-Pol fell עָלַי֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lai on שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there יַ֖ד <WH3027> yad me that the hand אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהֹוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

וָאֶרְאֶ֗ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh, Then I beheld וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold דְמוּת֙ <WH1823> de-Mut and lo a likeness כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> ke-mar-'eh- as the appearance אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> 'Esh, of fire מִמַּרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> mi-mar-'Eh from the appearance מָתְנָ֛יו <WH4975> ma-te-Nav of his loins וּלְמַ֖טָּה <WH4295> u-le-Mat-tah even downward אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> 'Esh; fire וּמִמָּתְנָ֣יו <WH4975> u-mi-ma-te-Nav and from his loins וּלְמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> u-le-Ma'-lah, even upward כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> ke-mar-'eh- as the appearance זֹ֖הַר <WH2096> Zo-har of brightness כְּעֵ֥ין <WH5869> ke-'Ein as the colour הַחַשְׁמַֽלָה׃ <WH2830> ha-chash-Ma-lah. of amber

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach And he put forth תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> tav-Nit the form יָ֔ד <WH3027> Yad, of an hand וַיִּקָּחֵ֖נִי <WH3947> vai-yik-ka-Che-ni and took בְּצִיצִ֣ת <WH6734> be-tzi-Tzit me by a lock רֹאשִׁ֑י <WH7218> ro-Shi; of mine head וַתִּשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> vat-tis-Sa lifted me up אֹתִ֣י <WH853> 'o-Ti ר֣וּחַ׀ <WH7307> Ru-ach and the spirit בֵּֽין־ <WH996> bein- between הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz between the earth וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> u-Vein between הַשָּׁמַ֡יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim and the heaven וַתָּבֵא֩ <WH935> vat-ta-Ve and brought אֹתִ֨י <WH853> 'o-Ti יְרוּשָׁלְַ֜מָה <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Le-mah to Jerusalem בְּמַרְא֣וֹת <WH4759> be-mar-'ot me in the visions אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֜תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach to the door שַׁ֤עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַפְּנִימִית֙ <WH6442> hap-pe-ni-Mit of the inner הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> hap-po-Neh that looketh צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> sham in it מוֹשַׁ֔ב <WH4186> mo-Shav, where [was] the seat סֵ֖מֶל <WH5566> Se-mel of the image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> hak-kin-'Ah of jealousy הַמַּקְנֶֽה׃ <WH7069> ham-mak-Neh. which provoketh to jealousy

וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-Hin-neh- and behold שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> Sham, there כְּב֖וֹד <WH3519> ke-Vod And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <WH4758> kam-mar-'Eh [was] there according to the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti that I saw בַּבִּקְעָֽה׃ <WH1237> bab-bik-'Ah. in the plain

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- he unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man שָׂא־ <WH5375> sa- lift up נָ֥א <WH4994> na now עֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> 'ei-Nei-cha thine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech now the way צָפ֑וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah; toward the north וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa So I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech the way צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah, toward the north וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> mitz-tza-fOn and behold northward לְשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> le-Sha-'ar at the gate הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar סֵ֛מֶל <WH5566> Se-mel this image הַקִּנְאָ֥ה <WH7068> hak-kin-'Ah of jealousy הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh this בַּבִּאָֽה׃ <WH872> bab-bi-'Ah. in the entry

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer He said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- furthermore unto me Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הֲרֹאֶ֥ה <WH7200> ha-ro-'Eh seest אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you; מֵהֵם me-hem כמָ֣ה Mah ק; הֵ֣ם <WH1992> Hem like קעֹשִׂ֑ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim; thou what they do תּוֹעֵב֨וֹת <WH8441> to-'e-Vot abominations גְּדֹל֜וֹת <WH1419> ge-do-Lot ;[even] the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> beit- that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל׀ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עֹשִׂ֣ים <WH6213> 'o-Sim committeth פֹּ֗ה <WH6311> Poh, here לְרָֽחֳקָה֙ <WH7368> le-ro-cho-Kah here that I should go far off מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al and מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <WH4720> mik-da-Shi, chapel וְעוֹד֙ <WH5750> ve-'Od again תָּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> ta-Shuv still תִּרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> tir-'Eh, thee yet again [and] thou shalt see תּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <WH8441> to-'e-Vot abominations גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> ge-do-Lot. greater ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve And he brought אֹתִ֖י <WH853> 'o-Ti אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach me to the door הֶֽחָצֵ֑ר <WH2691> he-cha-Tzer; of the court וָאֶרְאֶ֕ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh and when I looked וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold חֹר־ <WH2356> chor- hole אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad behold a בַּקִּֽיר׃ <WH7023> bak-Kir. in the wall

וָאָבוֹא֮ <WH935> va-'a-Vo So I went in וָֽאֶרְאֶה֒ <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh and saw וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold כָל־ <WH3605> chol every תַּבְנִ֜ית <WH8403> tav-Nit and behold every form רֶ֤מֶשׂ <WH7431> Re-mes of creeping things וּבְהֵמָה֙ <WH929> u-ve-he-Mah beasts שֶׁ֔קֶץ <WH8263> She-ketz, and abominable וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all גִּלּוּלֵ֖י <WH1544> gil-lu-Lei and all the idols בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מְחֻקֶּ֥ה <WH2707> me-chuk-Keh pourtrayed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַקִּ֖יר <WH7023> hak-Kir upon the wall סָבִ֥יב׀ <WH5439> sa-Viv round about סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. around

וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- indeed אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh Therefore will I also deal בְחֵמָ֔ה <WH2534> ve-che-Mah, in fury לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- no תָח֥וֹס <WH2347> ta-Chos shall not spare עֵינִ֖י <WH5869> 'ei-Ni mine eye וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor אֶחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> 'ech-Mol; neither will I have pity וְקָרְא֤וּ <WH7121> ve-ka-re-'U and though they cry בְאָזְנַי֙ <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Nai in mine ears ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol voice גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, with a loud וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> 'esh-Ma' [yet] will I not hear אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> o-Tam.
